modelCorrections.beforeModification: <div class="dialog-widget dialog-lightbox-widget dialog-type-buttons dialog-type-lightbox elementor-popup-modal" id="elementor-popup-modal-67353" aria-modal="true" role="document" tabindex="0" style="">
modelCorrections.afterModification: <div class="dialog-widget dialog-lightbox-widget dialog-type-buttons dialog-type-lightbox elementor-popup-modal" id="elementor-popup-modal-67353" role="document" tabindex="0" style="">
modelCorrections.rawOutput:
- Thought: The element has an ARIA attribute "aria-modal" which is not allowed according to the WCAG 2.1 violation description. The "aria-modal" attribute is used to indicate that an element is modal, but it is not a valid ARIA attribute.

- Observation: The "aria-modal" attribute should be removed from the element to comply with WCAG 2.1.

- Action: Remove the "aria-modal" attribute from the HTML.

- Corrected HTML:
<div class="dialog-widget dialog-lightbox-widget dialog-type-buttons dialog-type-lightbox elementor-popup-modal" id="elementor-popup-modal-67353" role="document" tabindex="0" style="">
